Title: Shopware 6's password recovery link does not expire after email change
Description: When a customer changes their email address after requesting a password reset, the old password reset link (tied to the previous email) remains valid. An attacker with access to the old email inbox is potentially able to reset the customerâ€™s password even after the user changes their email address.
